permission.create: auth.uid != null || 'admin' in auth.role || 'super_admin' in auth.role
permission.update: doc.user_id == auth.uid || 'admin' in auth.role || 'super_admin' in auth.role
permission.delete: doc.user_id == auth.uid || 'admin' in auth.role || 'super_admin' in auth.role
